Description:
Family Size Investment
Set on a massive 842m2 allotment in a quiet court location is this fantastic family home with a very accommodating floor plan. Also lending itself as the ideal investment with an excellent rental return of $270 per week. Featuring 4 bedrooms all with BIR's, the master with its own Ensuite. Enjoy two separate living areas surrounding the large central dining and light filled kitchen. Outside boasts a large backyard for the kids and easy entertaining. If you are in need of space to store a boat, trailer or caravan then this property is certain to meet those needs with double gates providing clear access through to a big double shed and further off-street parking. Includes ducted heating and split system A/C. The home is solid and allows you to simply move straight in or leased out but would respond well to a cosmetic freshen up. Located within close proximity to Corio Shopping Village plus quick access to the Melbourne road and train station. Representing great value, this is a must see!
Insights: 4 Kullaroo Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Prime On Primlea!"
Situated close to shopping centres and public transport, you have all the amenities at your fingertips while remaining in a quiet court location. Plus, with easy access to the Geelong ring road only minutes away, commuting to Melbourne, Geelong or the surf coast is a breeze.
This home has everything that you need; boasting a double lock up garage with drive-through rear access, 4 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR?s, including a spacious master with ensuite and WIR, as well as an open plan kitchen/dining area fitted with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar and an abundance of cupboard space. From there you can access one of two light-filled living rooms.
Bringing both indoors and outdoors together via a large alfresco dining area and backyard, flowing seamlessly from the kitchen and living area, makes this property both family friendly and an entertainer?s delight.
The vendor has made it clear that this property must be SOLD, so book your inspection today and secure your spot in the magnificent Rose Park Estate.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Opportunity Knocks On Approx 760m2
On a unique extra large 760m2 approx block lies a perfect opportunity to capitalise, whether you are a first home buyer, renovator, investor or even a developer (STCA). Take advantage of a terrific location offering easy access to the Geelong ring road, shopping, school's, medical facilities and public transport. Working from the outside in there is a large lock up carport leading through to a huge garage with basin & toilet, and extra large rear yard suitable for subdivision (subject to council approval), or perfect for year round entertaining family and friends with room for children and pets to play. Inside offers a perfect family flexible living, incorporating 3 good sized bedrooms all with built in robes, spacious family bathroom, and separate laundry. With a current rental return of $260 per week making this a fantastic addition to any investment portfolio. Boasting great value for money, this is a home you will want to call your own. Inspection is a must.

Description:
An Investment like no other! 6% Return!
Looking for an exceptional investment opportunity? Your search is finally over, here it is! Positioned just a short distance from all major amenities this premium family home has been superbly renovated throughout for maximum comfort. Currently tenanted at $360 pw the home possesses a potential 6% rental yield, perfect for anyone looking to extend their investment portfolio. Offering a total of 5 bedrooms (2 with BIR's) this charming family home offers plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy! The spacious front lounge upon entry provides gas heating with easy access through to the meals area adjacent the stylish & updated kitchen. Towards the middle of the home lies the generous family sized bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, while a second bathroom sits just down the hall and provides 2-way access through to one of the rear bedrooms. A second living area at the back of the home allows access through to the securely fenced backyard via a deck. Positioned perfectly just a short distance to the Corio Shopping Centre, quality schools for all ages, Corio train station as well as multiple reserves. Commuting is a breeze with easy access down Princes Hwy to Melbourne or just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's CBD. Set on approx. 556m2 of land this fantastic family home will surely impress, enquire today!
Photo ID Required

Description:
"An Unrivalled Opportunity?
Brilliantly located close to everything, Northern Bay Colleges? Hendy Street Campus just a short walk away as well as a pre-school in the same vicinity. Bus routes also available along Hendy Street & Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio community park & football/cricket/netball club just around the corner. Corio Village Shopping Centre is conveniently located walking distance/ a short drive away on Bacchus Marsh Road.
-3 large bedrooms, master with built in robe and A/C
-Spacious living with gas heating & ceiling fan that opens up into the kitchen/dining
-Kitchen is spacious with plenty of storage and boasts gas cooking & A/C
-Main bathroom has been semi updated, with separate bath & shower
-A very large grassed backyard has plenty of space for the kids to run around
-Single lock up garage behind gates
-Low maintenance gardens
-Large 684m2 (approx) block
-Currently tenanted for $265 per week, that?s a 6.26% yield (approx)
Don?t miss out on this opportunity, inspect today!

Description:
Incredible Family Home with Plenty of Space!
This vibrant, renovated and well looked after family home has been designed with maximum family comfort in mind. The 3BR property with a charming facade, situated on a corner allotment (562m2 approx.), will certainly capture your attention with its stylish presentation and light filled rooms. The warm & inviting spacious living room located at the entrance contains a central gas heater and flows through to the meals/kitchen area which provides spectacular views to the extensive rear yard. Just of the main hall lies the 3 generous bedrooms all with BIR's as well as the updated central bathroom with a separate toilet available through the laundry. With a fully fenced backyard, privacy is not an issue; the enormous undercover entertainment area will without a doubt impress all, offering endless opportunities for use while still leaving plenty of yard for the kids to enjoy. Adjoining the single garage you'll find an additional multipurpose room, currently acting a 4th bedroom with BIR's and electric heater already included this space is perfect for a teenagers retreat! Appealing to families and first homebuyers this spectacular home is in close to proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre & surrounded by numerous schools for all ages. Public transport is easily accessible, minutes' drive to Geelong's CBD and just around the corner from the Ring Road for Melbourne commuters it doesn't get much better than this. Inspections are a must to truly appreciate all the hard work & attention to details that has been put into making this property truly shine.
Photo ID Required

Description:
Rare Find for Large Family or Super Investment
With such generous living spaces and bathrooms to boot, this home can accommodate the largest of families. Whether it be to live in or let out, this home screams potential and offers sustainable living with its north facing verandah that beautifully lets in loads of light over winter while blocking out the sun over summer, plus there are solar panels with economic benefits. With 3 main bedrooms and a en suite to the master, there is also a sleep out with its own bathroom making it a great addition for extended family or even for a work-from-home business. Complete with a split system, gas heater plus a couple more air conditioners with a second enclosed verandah plus garden shedsworkshop. Handy to Corio Shopping Centre, schools, transport and offering easy access to the Ring Road, this is the perfect opportunity for one savvy buyer who can see the possibilities.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Character & Charm With Nothing To Do!
From the moment you open the front door to this modern brick veneer home, you will be welcomed with character & charm. Situated in a quiet street, this versatile property situated on approx. 628sqm will tick all the boxes for any growing family, first home buyer or investor. Vibrantly renovated this home has been designed with maximum family comfort in mind. The 3BR property will certainly capture your attention with its stylish presentation and light filled rooms. Featuring polished timber floorboards throughout. The home offers 3 spacious bedrooms along with its open planned living area allowing room for the family while gas heating and air conditioning ensure comfort through every season. The contemporary kitchen has been superbly renovated including quality stainless steel appliances along with the sleek & modern bathroom to service the household. This elegant family home has been finished to perfection with close attention to detail in all aspects. With close proximity to quality schools for all ages this home provides easy access to all major amenities including Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, Ring Road for commuters & only a short drive to Geelong's CBD. Inspections are a must to secure this immaculate home before it's too late!

Description:
Immaculate and spacious - only one owner!!
If you want spacious living then this much loved family home is on the market for the first time in 62 years! Large lounge with street views, wood heater & air conditioner. Three super sized bedrooms all with built in robes. A very central bathroom for easy family use. Open plan kitchen and dining with an abundance of cupboard space, gas stove & range hood. 2 living area has sliding doors to decked undercover decked entertainment area. Big laundry and plus a 2nd toilet. Outside is a bungalow perfect for a teenager! Plus there is a double carport and shed! Extra features are stunning polished floor boards, evaporative cooling and ducted heating. Close to everything, kindergarten, schools, doctors, public transport and Corio central. All your boxes will be ticked.
Insights: 309 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Start!
Nestled away in a quiet court location lies this neat 3 bedroom brick veneer home bursting with character and charm. Perfectly positioned with easy access to all major amenities the property consists of 3 generous bedrooms all serviced by the practical central bathroom while the main lounge provides gas heater and boasts large north facing windows allowing plenty of natural light through the home. The neat kitchen contains gas cooking and views overlooking the rear yard, situated adjacent the meals area which comes complete with bay window. Situated on a 542m2 allotment outside you'll find a single car garage, additional garden shed & low maintenance backyard. This affordable home is simply bursting with potential, perfectly suited to first home buyers, renovators and investors. Conveniently located within walking distance to Corio Shopping Centre, the property offers easy access to public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD. The choice is yours to either rent, renovate, or reside with a price this good inspections ASAP are a must!
Insights: 2 Montana Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Amazing Value!
If you are looking for an investment property or first home with just a short drive to all the main amenities including Corio Village shopping centre then look no further. Set on a generous allotment of 575m2 (approx.) is this great 3 bedroom family home. Offering a spacious lounge just off the entrance, with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through, a neat and tidy bathroom, fully equipped kitchen with gas appliances that sits adjacent the dining area and 3 comfortable sized bedrooms (2 with BIR's). Outside provides plenty of room for entertaining family and friends with an extensive undercover alfresco area as well as tandem carport leading to the lock up garage at the rear of the property. Easy access to medical facilities, public transport, schools for all ages and just minutes from the Princes Hwy for Geelong commuters & Ring Road for Melbourne or Surf Coast commuters. A fantastic opportunity awaits the first home buyer, renovator or the astute investor to purchase this fantastic home at a very affordable price today! Currently tenanted at $240 pw.
Insights: 3 Halliwell Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Investors! Here Is Your Next Opportunity!"
Located in a quiet street, close to all amenities, including Corio Village Shopping Centre, schools & public transport all just a short walk or drive away! Just mins away from the ring road so perfect for commuters in Melbourne
-3 bedrooms with 2 living areas or 4 bedrooms with 1 living area
-All bedrooms are large in size
-A large family bathroom as well as second shower & toilet off the laundry
-Spacious kitchen, an abundance of cupboard space, breakfast bar & dishwasher!
-Light filled living/dining with coonara, timber flooring & ceiling fan
-Tenants currently paying $280.00 per week
-Single lock up garage under roof line with internal access
-Lots of storage
-Covered verandah out the back perfect for entertaining
-Spacious backyard
Perfect for an investor to sit back & reap the rewards or a first home buyer getting into the market! Inspect today!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
